definition: Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: Our design originated from the cloth of Zhouzi high school students with some improvement. " The designer told us."
sentences.chinese: 我們的設計源於周治太學生漢服，進行了一些改良。

sentences.english: The Han-style clothes they wore were also self-designed referring to historical information.
sentences.chinese: 所穿的漢服也是根據一些歷史資料由他們自己設計的。

sentences.english: Hanfu clothing is the traditional clothing of the Han Chinese (Han -the predominant ethnic group of China).
sentences.chinese: 漢服是中國漢民族傳統服飾。

sentences.english: For millennia, Han Chinese clothing retained its simple and elegant style.
sentences.chinese: 幾千年來，漢服保留了其古樸典雅的風格。

sentences.english: Han Costume, the traditional costume of Han Ethnics.
sentences.chinese: 漢服，漢民族的傳統服裝。

sentences.english: The Han-style clothes are a tradition with different style in different period.
sentences.chinese: 漢服是個統稱，不同時期有不同的風格。

sentences.english: The organizer hoped that people can know more about ancient etiquettes and Han Chinese costume.
sentences.chinese: 組織者希望人們能瞭解更多地古代禮節和漢服。

sentences.english: The Han Chinese clothing or the Hanfu covered all the traditional Chinese clothing worn by people in that era.
sentences.chinese: 漢服包含了那個時期中國人穿着的所有傳統中國服飾。

sentences.english: There are ceremonial wear and informal wear in Hanfu clothing.
sentences.chinese: 禮儀有磨損和非正式的服裝穿漢服。

definition: Fuxing district of Handan city 邯鄲市|邯郸市[Han2 dan1 shi4], Hebei/Fuxing or Fuhsing township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
Chinese character/CL:個|个[ge4]/Japanese: kanji/Korean: hanja/Vietnamese: hán tự
appreciation of the finer things in life
to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
Chinese national culture/studies of ancient Chinese civilization/the Imperial College (history)
